name: PRAWLING
CAT
PRAWLING CAT.effect: IF REVEALED AT START PHASE, +1 POWER

name: COWARDLY
RAT
COWARDLY RAT.effect: WHEN REVEALED, CAN MOVE TO EMPTY COLUMN

name: TINY
INSECT
TINY INSECT.effect: CANNOT BE DESTROYED BY POWER LEVEL ABOVE 9

name: TRASH
RACCOON
TRASH RACCOON.effect: WHEN REVEALED, ADD 1 CARD FROM GRAVE

name: SWARM
INSECT
SWARM INSECT.effect: WHEN REVEALED, SUMMON ANY NUMBER OF SWARM INSECTS FROM YOUR DECK TO ANY EMPTY CREATURE ZONE

name: PRAWLING
TIGER
PRAWLING TIGER.effect: WHEN REVEALED, ADD ANY BONUS POWER FROM TRIBUTE CREATURE. IF REVEALED AT START PHASE, +1 POWER

name: SCOUTING
MEERKAT
SCOUTING MEERKAT.effect: WEHN REVEALED, PEEK AT ONE SET CARD IN A OPPONENT TRIGGER ZONE

name: MOTHER
BEAR
MOTHER BEAR.effect: WEHN REVEALED, SUMMON A BABY BEAR FROM DECK. IF NO BABY BEAR IN ONE OF YOUR ADJACENT CREATURE ZONE, DESTROY THIS CARD

name: EGGEATER
SNAKE
EGGEATER SNAKE.effect: WHEN REVEALED, DESTROY ONE CREATURES WITH LESS THAN 4 POWER LEVEL

name: EGGEATER
DINOSAUR
EGGEATER DINOSAUR.effect: WHEN REVEALED, DESTROY ALL CREATURES WITH LESS THAN 5 POWER LEVEL

name: LONE
WOLF
LONE WOLF.effect: IF NOT ONLY CREATURE YOU CONTROL, DESTROY THIS CARD

name: STICKY
SPIDER
STICKY SPIDER.effect: WHEN REVEALED, TARGET 1 CREATURE. THAT CREATURE CANNOT CHANGE ZONE

name: SCARY
LION
SCARY LION.effect: WHEN REVEALED, RETURN ALL OTHER CREATURES TO OWNERS HANDS

name: SAPPING
SNAKE
SAPPING SNAKE.effect: WHEN REVEALED, SWAP POWER WITH A FACEUP CREATURE

name: POSIONOUS
SNAKE
POISONOUS SNAKE.effect: WHEN REVEALED, TARGET 1 FACEUP CREATURE. THAT CREATURE LOSES 1 POWER EVERY START PHASE

name: MYSTERY
EGG
MYSTERY EGG.effect: IF DESTROYED THIS TURN, AT END PHASE, SUMMON ANY 0 TRIBUTE MONSTER FROM YOUR DECK

name: HATCHING
EGG
HATCHING EGG.effect: IF DESTROYED THIS TURN, AT END PHASE, FREE SUMMON ANY 0/1 TRIBUTE MONSTER FROM YOUR HAND

name: CLAPPING
SEALION
CLAPPING SEALION.effect: ALL CREATURES YOU CONTROL GET +3 POWER

name: MISSING
LINK
MISSING LINK.effect: MUST BE TRIBUTED WITH 3 MONSTERS THAT REQUIRE 3 TRIBUTES. WHEN REVEALED, WIN GAME

name: RABID
FOX
RABID FOX.effect: DESTROY THIS CARD AT THE END PHASE

name: SHY
MOLE
SHY MOLE.effect: DURING THE END PHASE, HIDE THIS CARD

name: CONTROLLING
PARASITE
CONTROLLING PARASITE.effect: WHEN REVEALED, DESTROY THIS CARD, TAKE CONTROL OF 1 CREATURE YOUR OPPONENT CONTROLS. RETURN CONTROL AT END PHASE

name: CHARGING
DUNGBETTLE
CHARGING INSECT.effect: WHEN REVEALED, +3 POWER UNTIL END PHASE

name: CHARGING
BULL
CHARGING BULL.effect: WHEN REVEALED, +5 POWER UNTIL END PHASE

name: CHARGING
RHINO
CHARGING RHINO.effect: WHEN REVEALED, +7 POWER UNTIL END PHASE

name: LAUGHING
HYENA
LAUGHING HYENA.effect: WHEN REVEALED, CAN MOVE 1 OPPONENT CREATURE INTO THIS COLUMN

name: CHEEKY
HYENA
CHEEKY HYENA.effect: WHEN REVEALED, ADD 1 CHEEKY CARD TO HAND

name: DIGGING
DOG
DIGGING DOG.effect: WHEN REVEALED, ADD 1 DINOSAUR OR UNDEAD CREATURE FROM GRAVE TO HAND

name: UNDEAD
PIG
UNDEAD PIG.effect: WHEN REVEALED, CAN SUMMON 1 UNDEAD FROM GRAVE. DESTROY THIS CARD AT THE END PHASE

name: UNDEAD
CROW
UNDEAD CROW.effect: WHEN REVEALED, CAN SUMMON 1 UNDEAD FROM GRAVE. DESTROY THIS CARD AT THE END PHASE

name: UNDEAD
EAGLE
UNDEAD EAGLE.effect: WHEN REVEALED, CAN PLACE 1 TRIGGER CARD FROM GRAVE IN YOUR TRIGGER ZONE. DESTROY THIS CARD AT THE END PHASE

name: RABID
BEAR
RABID BEAR.effect: DESTROY THIS CARD AT THE END PHASE

name: RECYCLING
PIG
RECYCLING PIG.effect: WHEN REVEALED, DRAW 1 CARD, DISCARD 1 CARD

name: SUCKING
ANTEATER
SUCKING ANTEATER.effect: WHEN REVEALED, DISCARD 1 RANDOM OPPONENTS CARD

name: RIGHTOUS
EAGLE
RIGHTOUS EAGLE.effect: WHEN REVEALED, SHUFFLE 1 CARD FROM GRAVE INTO DECK

name: EGGLAYING
SPIDER
EGGLAYING SPIDER.effect: WHEN THIS CARD DESTROYS CREATURE, DRAW 1 CARD

name: CHUNKY
FOOD
CHUNKY FOOD.effect: WHEN CREATURE ATTACKED, +4 POWER TO YOUR CREATURE UNTIL END PHASE

name: FAST
FOOD
FAST FOOD.effect: WHEN CREATURE PLACED, MOVE TO DIFFERENT COLUMN

name: RIGHTOUS
REBIRTH
RIGHTOUS REBIRTH.effect: WHEN CARD MOVED FROM GRAVE, SHUFFLE ALL GRAVES INTO DECKS

name: ANGERED
STAMPEDE
ANGERED STAMPEDE.effect: WHEN RED CREATURE REVEALED, SUMMON 1 ANGERED CREATURE FROM DECK

name: QUICK
DEATH
QUICK DEATH.effect: WHEN YOUR CREATURE REVEALED, DESTROY IT

name: UNDEAD
REBIRTH
UNDEAD REBIRTH.effect: WHEN BROWN CREATURE IS REVEALED, DISCARD 1 BROWN CARD

name: CHEEKY
FORESIGHT
CHEEKY FORESIGHT.effect: WHEN CARD PLACED, PEEK AT CARD

name: TRIGGERING
TRADE
TRIGGERING TRADE.effect: WHEN TRIGGER CARD PLACED, SWAP CARD WITH ONE OF YOUR PLACED TRIGGER CARDS

name: SOBERING
TRADE
SOBERING FOOD.effect: WHEN CREATURES POWER CHANGES, RESET TO ORGINAL

name: FRIENDLY
SPECIES
FRIENDLY SPECIES.effect: WHEN CREATURE REVEALED, SUMMON CREATURE WITH SAME SECOND NAME, RETURN ORGINAL CREATURE TO DECK IF STILL FACEUP

name: CLASHING
ADJECTIVES
CLASHING ADJECTIVES.effect: WHEN CARD REVEALED, ADD TO HAND 1 CARD WITH SAME FIRST NAME

name: SHY
ANIMAL
SHY ANIMAL.effect: AT THE START PHASE, FLIP 1 CREATURE FACEDOWN

name: FREEZING
FOOD
FREEZING FOOD.effect: WHEN FOOD CARD SENT TO GRAVE, ADD CARD TO HAND

name: TALL
GRASS
TALL GRASS.effect: WHEN A GREEN CREATURE IS SENT TO THE GRAVE, ADD CARD TO HAND

name: POISONOUS
FANGS
POISONOUS FANGS.effect: WHEN POISONOUS CREATURE IS REVEALED, APPLY ITS EFFECT TO ALL OPPONENTS CREATURES

name: CHEEKY
MIXUP
CHEEKY MIXUP.effect: WHEN A CREATURE IS PLACED, PICK UP ALL FACEDOWN CREATURES. PLACE THEM BACK DOWN IN ANY COLUMN

name: STOP
SIGN
STOP SIGN.effect: WHEN CREATURE IS MOVED, MOVE THAT CREATURE TO ANY COLUMN

name: FENCED
FIELD
FENCED FIELD.effect: WHEN REVEALED, TARGET 1 EMPTY COLUMN, NO CREATURES CAN BE MOVED OR PLACED THERE

name: ANGERED
CHAOS
ANGERED CHAOS.effect: ALL ANGERED CREATURS GAIN THIS EFFECT: 'WHEN THIS CARD DESTROYS A CREATURE, SUMMON 1 ANGERED CREATURE FROM DECK'

name: ANICENT
FORESIGHT
ANICENT FORESIGHT.effect: WHEN YOU DRAW CARD FOR START PHASE, DRAW 2, RETURN 1

name: UNDEAD
GAMBLE
UNDEAD GAMBLE.effect: AT THE START PHASE, MILL THE TOP CARD OF YOUR DECK

name: GREEN
FLAME
GREEN FLAME.effect: IF 3 GREEN CREATURES YOU CONTROL ARE FLIPPED UP AT BATTLE PHASE, DEAL 2 DAMAGE TO YOUR OPPONENT
